short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store notes about your LinkedIn connections in your Google Drive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the beta version of LinkedIn Notepad. This extension aims to enhance your LinkedIn and networking experience by allowing you to store and organize notes about your connections.

Key Features:

1. Effortlessly Save Information: Quickly make and retrieve notes about your LinkedIn connections.
2. Tag Your Notes: Add tags for easy categorization and better organization.
3. Data Security: Your notes are securely stored and backed up on Google Drive, ensuring peace of mind.
4. Sync Across Devices: Access your notes from any browser, keeping your information consistent and up-to-date.

This is an ongoing project. 
If you have any feedback or feature requests, please feel free to email me at vlad.shev@gmail.com.
